title: Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modifying it
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Set a default value in the list box of a report parameter.
2. Modify the default value.
3. Observe that the modified default value is not retained.
